-ware.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: things made of a particular material, especially for use in the home
-ware.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: things used in a particular place for the preparation or serving of food
-ware.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: ovenware  (=dishes for use in the oven)
-ware.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: things used in operating a computer
-ware.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: shareware  (=programs which can be shared via the Internet)
